articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Fully Opening Minutes of Inter-Korean Summit to Public
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Fully Opening Minutes of Inter-Korean Summit to Public
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued an urgent statement on Thursday as follows:
					The south Korean puppet group recently committed such reckless act as fully opening to public the minutes of the 2007 north-south summit, stunning the world people.
					
					By origin, the summit minutes are handled as top secret in any country and they have been strictly kept secret as "minutes of president" in south Korea, too.
					
					During the "presidential election" in 2012 the puppet conservative group raised the issue of opening to public the minutes, claiming that former president Roh Moo Hyun made remarks calling for giving up the "northern limit line" in the West Sea at the north-south summit in 2007, in a bid to turn the situation in the election favorable to the group, but failed to do so due to the strong rebuff of public opinion.
					
					As the present regime is shaking to its very foundation due to the disclosure of the "case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the election," the present conservative group fully opened to public all of a sudden the summit minutes, taking issue again with the remarks made by Roh Moo Hyun in a bid to calm down public uproar.
					
					Such rash action unprecedented not only in the history of the inter-Korean relations but in world history of diplomacy has driven south Korea into mayhem, and opposition parties, broad spectrum of people and media are strongly protesting it as "breach of state spirit unprecedented in history",  "coup", "rebellion", "action above law", etc.
					
					As known to everybody, the 2007 north-south summit was a great event of national history which ushered in a new phase of the development of inter-Korean relations and national reunification together with the June 15 era.
					
					The summit discussed important issues of national reconciliation, unity, independent reunification, peace and prosperity in which the historic October 4 declaration was adopted.
					
					The October 4 declaration was unanimously hailed and supported by all Koreans and the whole world.
					
					What the present conservative group did clearly proves that it is a bandit of unheard-of depraved politicians and political gangsters who openly defile the historic October 4 declaration and abuse even the inter-Korean summit as a plaything for political strife. It also proves that south Korea's politics is a politics of most ignorant and childish philistines which can be seen only in a backward colonial country and reckless politics devoid of any common sense of politics and diplomacy and ethics of inter-Korean relations.
					
					As far as the issue of the "northern limit line" in the West Sea touted by the conservative group is concerned, it is a bogus line because even its architect American master recognized it as an illegal one. It is, therefore, preposterous to vociferate about its "defence" and "preservation.‚Äù
					
					Moreover, the October 4 declaration clarifies a reasonable way of peacefully settling the issue of the maritime demarcation line in the West Sea. Had it been sincerely implemented, it would not have posed any problem.
					
					When the unheard-of plot to grab power was brought to light due to the "case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the presidential election" and broad spectrum of people have become vocal protesting and denouncing it, the conservative group made such last-ditch efforts as opening to public the summit minutes in a bid to divert elsewhere public criticism, weather the crisis of the regime and eliminate the pro-reunification democratic forces by branding them as "forces following the north".
					
					Lurking behind this is a sinister intention to chill the desire of all fellow countrymen for inter-Korean dialogue and improved inter-Korean relations and kick off frantic rackets for confrontation with fellow countrymen in south Korea.
					
					How can thrice-cursed gangster-like group properly approach dialogue for achieving the reunification of the country, the unanimous desire of all the Koreans, and improving inter-Korean relations as the group is using even the north-south summit, which candidly discussed the issue of the nation's destiny and the issue of inter-Korean relations, as a plaything for a political strife.
					
					The conservative group's opening to public the summit minutes is the height of the treacherous acts for confrontation which can be committed only by the most despicable traitors who are unhesitatingly hurting the dignity and supreme interests of the nation to gratify their base political greed.
					
					The group is often talking about "confidence" but it has no face to talk about trust as it is unhesitatingly using even the minutes of the north-south summit as a political plaything to meet its partisan interests, though they should be handled as the most sacred. 
					
					The group's unilateral opening to public the summit minutes without approval of the north is a mockery of the dignity of its supreme leadership and a grave provocation to the dialogue partner.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen dared not open to public the minutes of the summit.
					
					It is clear to everybody that the minutes could not be opened to public without the personal approval of the present chief of Chongwadae.
					
					Given that "the case of the Intelligence Service's interference in the presidential election" and the opening of the minutes are directly related to the present regime of south Korea, it is needless to say that Chongwadae was behind the action.
					
					In fact, if the issue of "following the north" should be called into question, none of the successive chief executives of south Korea who visited Pyongyang can be free. 
					
					Even under the situation where the minutes of the summit are abused for sinister political purposes, who can believe in the sincerity of another summit and "summit diplomacy?"
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the reckless action of the south Korean conservative forces.
					
					The opened minutes irrefutably proved that the controversial issues raised by the group are nothing but far-fetched assertions contrary to facts. Finally, it reminds one of the adage that one who digs a pit for another falls into it himself.
					
					One's evil doings will rebound on oneself. 
					
					The south Korean puppet group will not be able to escape the most shameful end in face of all Koreans' condemnation and denunciation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing German Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing German Ambassador
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Gerhard Thiedemann, German ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell visit to him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Danish Queen Hopes for Development of Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Danish Queen Hopes for Development of Relations with DPRK
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Margrethe II, queen of Denmark, received credentials from Pak Kwang Chol, DPRK ambassador to her country, on June 21.
					The queen hoped that the Korean people would register successes in the drive to develop the economy and improve the standard of people's living, expressing belief that the bilateral relations would grow stronger.

articles.title: KPA Servicepersons Tour Mt. Taedok and Panmunjom
articles.content:
KPA Servicepersons Tour Mt. Taedok, Panmunjom
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) have continued the study tour of major battle sites in the period of the Korean war and revolutionary sites from the eastern area to the western area with the approach of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					The tour started in Kaesong City on June 24.
					
					Members of the tour group laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung in the city and paid tribute.
					
					On June 25 they arrived at the Taedoksan Post, the birthplace of the slogan "A-match-for-a-hundred".
					
					After going round the monument to the on-the-spot instructions of Kim Il Sung, watch post, bedroom and various places of the post, they held a remembrance meeting before the on-the-spot guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					At the meeting they vowed to dynamically intensify their trainings just as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu to be fully ready for combat and firmly prepare themselves as a death-defying corps for national reunification.
					
					Their program also involved a question-and-answer study contest of the anti-Japanese guerrilla style, reed flute contest, shooting and sports games. They conducted diverse activities to help civilians.
					
					They visited Panmunjom on Thursday.
					
					Before the monument to Kim Il Sung's autograph they recollected with deep emotion the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by working heart and soul for the reunification of the country in their lifetime.
					
					After looking round Panmun and Thongil pavilions, they held a meeting to evince their resolution at the hall where the Armistice Agreement was concluded.
					
					At the meeting a speaker said that if the day of the great war for national reunification comes, the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army would eliminate the cursed Military Demarcation Line with tanks, mete out merciless punishment to the provokers at the speed of a-match-for-a-hundred and thus surely bring the second July 27 of victory.
					
					Other speakers declared that the service personnel would wipe out to the last man the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group of traitors keen to deprive the people of their happiness through nuclear threat and moves for aggression.

articles.title: More Anti-U.S. Rallies Held in Different Parts of DPRK
articles.content:
More Anti-U.S. Rallies Held in Different Parts of DPRK
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Rallies of people of North Phyongan, South Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces were held Thursday on the occasion of June 25, the day of the struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					Present the events were senior officials of local party and power organs and working people's bodies, officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms, and teachers and students of universities and collages.
					
					Speakers said that the U.S. imperialists destroyed everything in this land to stifle the DPRK in its cradle and massacred innocent Koreans in cold blood during the past Korean war.
					
					They noted that the army and people of the DPRK waged a heroic struggle under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, defending the country and inflicting a shameful defeat upon the U.S. imperialists.
					
					They assailed the U.S. imperialists for going reckless in their moves to ignite another war in collusion with the south Korean puppet regime in a bid to realize the ambition to invade the DPRK.
					
					It is the firm belief of all service personnel and people of the DPRK that they are sure to win as they are led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, they said.
					
					They expressed the determination to bolster up the national defense capability under the uplifted banner of Songun and launch the general offensive and the final death-defying struggle to create the second and the third "Masikryong Speed" in order to decisively smash the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK.
					
					At the end of the rallies the participants staged demonstrations.

articles.title: June 25 Concert of Unhasu Orchestra Inspires People
articles.content:
June 25 Concert of Unhasu Orchestra Inspires People
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The June 25 concert of the Unhasu Orchestra is going on before full houses at the People's Theater here. June 25, 1950 is the day the U.S. provoked the Korean War (June 1950-July 1953). 
					Its numbers include songs "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic", "Song of New Spring", music video "War Plots of the U.S. Imperialists", mixed chorus "Song of National Defence", male solo and mixed pangchang "Death to the U.S. Imperialist Aggressors and female solo "Love to the Country, Enmity to the Enemy".
					
					The concert arouses the audience's indignation at the U.S., which unleashed the Korean War and inflicted enormous sufferings upon the Korean people, and hardens their will to take revenge on it
					
					The performance stresses the idea that arms are the only choice for settling accounts with the U.S. imperialists
					
					Sin Chol Ung, a worker of the Rangnang Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory, told KCNA:
					
					"The female solo 'Take a Thousand-fold Revenge" lashed me into fury against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					If the U.S. ignites another war on the Korean Peninsula, I will give vent to the pent-up grudge with arms in hand."
					
					Kim Sung Hyok, a student of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					"The concert reminded me of the tireless efforts President Kim Il Sung paid to defeating the U.S. invaders in the war.
					
					It also gave me conviction that the DPRK will emerge victorious as ever as it is led by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un."

articles.title: DPRK Artistes and Student Prove Successful at International Concours
articles.content:
DPRK Artistes, Student Prove Successful at International Concours
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Artistes Paek Song Hyok and Song Kyong Op of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces Song and Dance Ensemble won a top place in instrumental music ensemble and first places in bayan and accordion solo at the International Art Concours-Festival "Vacation in Moscow" held in Moscow from June 21 to 23.
					Pak Hyon Chol, teacher of Pyongyang Music School, placed second in bayan and accordion solo.
					
					Congratulating the DPRK musicians on their successes, the members of the jury and music experts expressed admiration at them, saying: All the members of the jury were stunned. They never thought Koreans would play bayan so excellently. Bayan duet, in particular, was flawless.
					
					The concours brought together more than 250 musicians from the DPRK, Russia, Belarus, Uzbekistan and other countries.
					
					Choe Kum Song, DPRK student of Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory, won the 4th international Schubert musicians and composers concours held from June 16 to 23.
					
					He came second in wind instrument, allowing no one to hold the first place.
					
					The members of the jury and music experts said that Choe's playing was excellent and it is the greatest discovery in this concours, expressing belief that he would grow to be a wonderful musical talent of the DPRK in the future.
					
					Over 180 musicians from different countries including the DPRK, Russia, China, Japan and Ukraine competed in piano, vocal music, wind instrument and string instrument.

articles.title: Kim Sa Ryang, Talented War Writer of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Sa Ryang, Talented War Writer of DPRK
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the title of DPRK Hero was posthumously awarded to Kim Sa Ryang (1914-1950), who was known as a talented war writer among the local people.
					Born into a businessman's family in Pyongyang, he studied at a higher normal school in Pyongyang in the period of the Japanese colonial rule over Korea.
					
					He then studied literary at a foreign university, after being expelled from the school for the reason that he joined a school strike.
					
					His first work was the short novel "Thosongrang" written in 1936.
					
					In the full-length travel sketches "Nomamanri" he wrote in China in 1945, he highly spoke of President Kim Il Sung as the "Sun of Korea" and the anti-Japanese guerrillas as the "Sun's Unit".
					
					Back home after the country's liberation, he was honored with the audience of Kim Il Sung on several occasions.
					
					Being active as a member of the Executive Committee of the General Federation of Art of North Korea, director of the International Culture Department and chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Federation of Art, he authored drama "Thunder" in 1946, which features the great personality of Kim Il Sung displayed in the victorious Pochonbo battle conducted during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, as well as many other dramas, novels, dramatic poems and essays.
					
					On August 28, 1946, the day when the inaugural meeting of the Workers' Party of North Korea was held, Kim Il Sung enjoyed the drama "Thunder", giving high appreciation of it.
					
					As the Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) broke out, he joined the Korean People's Army as a war writer and wrote many works, including diaries "From Seoul to Suwon", "We Won", "En Route to Guerrilla Zone in Mt. Jiri", "In Trench on Bank of Raktong River" and "Sea Is Seen". The works inspired the servicepersons with heroism and conviction of victory in the war.
					
					When he was encircled by the enemy forces while on a combat duty at a guerrilla unit in Mt. Jiri, he died a heroic death by exploding a bundle of grenades and shouting "Long Live General Kim Il Sung!"

articles.title: U.S. Mass Killing of Innocent People in Korean War
articles.content:
U.S. Mass Killing of Innocent People in Korean War
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- In the Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953), perpetrated for their military domination over the whole of Korea and the rest of Asia, the U.S. imperialists mercilessly killed many innocent people in a brutal way beyond human imagination.
					Their cruelty was well verified by Walker, commander of the U.S. 8th Army, who ordered to kill at random all inhabitants in the northern half of Korea irrespective of sex or age.
					
					During the temporary strategic retreat on the part of the Korean People's Army, the U.S. imperialists killed at least 120,000 inhabitants in Hwanghae Province (at that time), including more than 35,000 in Sinchon County alone.
					
					The killers hammered nails on skulls of people, cut off heads with saws and hung them upside down to set fire to their heads. Not content with such a cruel way, they gouged out eyeballs of people and skinned them alive and raped girls and other women before cutting off their breasts.
					
					Their murderous acts were all the same in south Korea, too.
					
					Two U.S. warplanes raided Rogun-ri, Yongdong County in North Chungchong Province, killing over 400 inhabitants seeking refuge.
					
					New York Times said that a big grave with about 3,000 children buried alive by the U.S. troops was discovered in Kwangju City.
					
					The U.S. forces murdered more than 1,300 people in Inchon City only in a day when they landed on the city in September 1950 and fired to death some 800 in Hungjae-dong on the outskirts of Seoul in a day.
					
					From January to March 1952, they dropped varieties of germ bombs in 169 areas of the northern half of Korea 804 times. The number of bombers involved in the drop of germ bombs amounted to nearly 480 each day.
					
					They did not hesitate to use chemical weapons. U.S. warplanes raided Nampho City four times on May 6, 1951 to drop poison-gas bombs, leaving 1,379 people dead. The territory of the DPRK witnessed 33 rounds of massive bombing of poison-gas from February 27 to April 9, 1952, with over 15 million napalm bombs dropped.
					
					Ahead of days of their retreat, the U.S. imperialist aggressors threatened to drop A-bomb on the northern half of Korea. And the U.S. warplanes pounced upon the bridges across the Taedong River in Pyongyang, leaving thousands of evacuees dead.
					
					The Korean people will surely settle accounts with the U.S. for their thrice-cursed crimes.

articles.title: Remarks of Those Who Provoked Korean War Refute Rumor about "Southward Invasion"
articles.content:
Remarks of Those Who Provoked Korean War Refute Rumor about "Southward Invasion"
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The United States has made every possible effort to make up for the bitter defeat it suffered in the Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) and cover up its true colors as the war provoker.
					But the historical facts can be neither forged nor distorted.
					
					The whole course of the war showed that the U.S. imperialists employed all tricks to unleash the war and abuse the name of the United Nations for perpetrating it.
					
					In particular, the U.S. imperialists clamored about "southward invasion by north Korea", the falsity of which was verified by confessions and testimonies of those involved in the war.
					
					MacArthur, commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East and commander of the "UN Forces" in the period of the Korean war, said when he was testifying on the outbreak of the Korean War at a hearing of the U.S. Senate Foreign Relations Committee in May 1951: In a word, the north Korean army was deployed far from the 38th parallel. It was a deployment for defense, not for offensive.
					
					Early in May 1950, the then U.S. Ambassador to south Korea Muccio reported to his country that there was scarcely any possibility of north Korea invading south Korea in the near future.
					
					Robert, head of the U.S. military advisory group in south Korea, told journalists toward the end of May 1950 that now there was no sign of the buildup of the north Korean army along the 38th parallel.
					
					Dulles, a warmonger, told MacArthur in Tokyo on June 20, 1950 that he could not find any possibility of "southward invasion" from north Korea.
					
					The military inspection team of the "UN Commission on Korea" in south Korea reported to the UN secretary general that it had not gotten any information on the "aggressive design" of north Korea.
					
					All the facts go to prove the falsity of the U.S. assertion that the Korean War was started with "southward invasion" by the DPRK.

articles.title: Press Report Proving Japan's Sexual Slavery Disclosed
articles.content:
Press Report Proving Japan's Sexual Slavery Disclosed
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A report carried by a Japanese paper which proves Japan's act of forcing many women into sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in the past was posted on a south Korean internet press on June 23.
					According to it, a paper dealing with the examination of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army contained data on the forcible recruitment of women by its soldiers in those days when the examination office of the Japanese Cabinet Secretariat announced the results of survey of those crimes.
					
					It was also disclosed that the Imperial Japanese Army forcibly took away Dutch women detained at a concentration camp in Indonesia and forced them into sexual slavery.
					
					Finally, it has become clear that the Japanese government has concealed and denied evidence proving the sexual slavery though it has kept those materials proving the crimes.
					
					The data opened to public this time prove that the remarks made by the Abe Cabinet in 2007 that there was no forcible drafting of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army are quite contrary to facts.
					
					As regards the new disclosure of the truth about the sexual slavery, a Japanese lawmaker asserted that the Abe Cabinet should immediately revoke the 2007 written answer.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Orchestrating Burlesque against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Orchestrating Burlesque against DPRK
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group gathered "fighters" during the Korean war at Jamsil Gymnasium in Seoul on Tuesday to hold a "ceremony marking the 63rd anniversary of the start of the June 25 war". It is mulling holding a "parade for Hoguk" from the Ryongsan War Memorial in Seoul to Seoul Square on Saturday with the puppet army and police involved. On June 23 south Korea is hosting the "peace camp of junior schoolchildren" being attended by youngsters of those countries which dispatched mercenaries to the Korean war. 
					Minju Joson Thursday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					These are anti-DPRK burlesques to distort the stark historical fact to instill enmity toward the DPRK into south Koreans and escalate moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					The Korean war was ignited by the U.S. by instigating the south Korean puppet army with an ambition to swallow up the young DPRK.
					
					If the south Korean puppet group had a reason, it should have bitterly condemned the U.S. for igniting the Korean war and inflicting disasters upon the Korean nation with June 25 as an occasion. Far from doing so, it is staging anti-DPRK burlesques whitewashing the hair-raising war crimes committed by the U.S. This is sycophancy toward the U.S. which can be committed only by the despicable traitors.
					
					What matters is that it invited to such burlesques youngsters of those countries which dispatched their mercenaries to the Korean war. This is a revelation of its real intention to hurt the DPRK at any cost in league with foreign forces as it did during the Korean war. 
					
					The south Korean authorities will get nothing but shameful defeat for their moves for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Evading Apology and Reparation for Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Evading Apology, Reparation for Past Crimes
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- On June 7 the British government made an official apology to Kenya, its former colony, for its past crimes.
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					Japan is blatantly challenging the universal cognition of history by the international community.
					
					It employed the whole gamut of intrigues to bury the crime-woven history into oblivion at first and is now evading the liquidation of the past blood-stained crimes, justifying them as "cause of justice". Top-class war criminals who spearheaded the Asia-Pacific war are being praised as "heroes", and even voices calling Japan's military occupation rule over Korea "legitimate" are ringing out in Japan.
					
					Textbooks deleting the heinous unethical criminal acts and beautifying the history of aggression are openly distributed. It is only Japan which has gone so shameless and base as to fabricate and distort the historical fact in the first half of the 20th century, the disastrous events that happened in relations with neighboring countries, in particular.
					
					The shameless and despicable behavior of Japan doggedly evading the inglorious past is being justified with absurd logic that admission and liquidation of the past crimes "mean maltreating oneself".
					
					Japan is persisting in its wrong attitude and stand toward the past crimes, and the moves for twisting history are becoming ever more pronounced. Lurking behind this is its ambition to make such history repeat itself.
					
					But the Japanese authorities should clearly know that only disgrace and ruin will be brought to Japan wriggling in the nightmare of militarism. Japan would be well advised to ponder over its destiny and future and follow the trend of the present times that has undergone change.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Arrest Members of South Headquarters of Pomminryon
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Arrest Members of South Headquarters of Pomminryon
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Security Bureau of the south Korean Police Agency on Wednesday searched houses and offices of members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) including Kim Ul Su, acting chairman of the Headquarters, and arrested two core members on charges of the violation of the ill-famed "Security Law".
					The police took such fascist action by branding their activities as "enemy-benefiting acts". They charged that the two members "fully accepted the action line of the north by publishing a joint statement of the North, South and Overseas Headquarters of Pomminryon".
					
					The fascist police are taking issue with the part of the joint statement of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon saying that it is a nonsensical logic and preposterous that the U.S. can conduct a nuclear test, launch missiles and pose a nuclear threat as it pleases but the north is not allowed to launch satellites for peaceful purposes and conduct a nuclear test for self-defence.
					
					The police threatened to take a legal action against them.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Massacre of Koreans during Great Kanto Quake under Fire in Seoul
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Massacre of Koreans during Great Kanto Quake under Fire in Seoul
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The solidarity of citizens for Korean victims in 1923 great quake in Japan and the committee for arranging the memorial service for the victims of the great Kanto quake held a meeting at the educational institution of the general assembly of the Christian Presbyterian Church in Seoul on June 20 on the occasion of the 90th anniversary of the Japanese imperialists' massacre of innocent Koreans in Japan during the great Kanto quake.
					Kim Jong Su, permanent representative of the above-said solidarity, condemned the Japanese government for evading the responsibility for the massacre, distorting and whitewashing the criminal history of Japan.
					
					Kang Tok Sang, honorary professor at Shiga Prefectural University, said that Japan's massacre of innocent Koreans during the quake was a product of Japan's discrimination against the Korean nation and its policy of hostility towards the nation, adding that such discrimination is still rampant in society of Japan.
					
					Japanese personages conducted an investigation into such massacres as committed in Sumida Ward of Tokyo Metropolis, Yokohama City of Kanagawa Prefecture and Chiba Prefecture.
					
					According to them, Koreans were massacred on the basis of the rumor spread by the then Japanese authorities that "Koreans set fire to houses" and "put poison into wells" right after the great quake occurred in Kanto area on Sept. 1, 1923.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in UK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in UK
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for celebrating the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated in London on June 21.
					Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted on websites of Russia, Ukraine and Germany from June 12 to 15 to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					They included websites of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, the Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and the Anti-"Globalization" Movement of Russia, Russian internet TV Krasnoye Televideniye and the Ukrainian internet paper Obektivnaya Gazeta They carried articles titled "Echo of June 15" and "North-South Joint Declaration was adopted in Pyongyang on June 15, 2000", illustrated with photos of the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification and reunion of separatist families and their relatives.
					
					An article titled "June 15 reunification" was posted on the website of the MS Tourist Agency of Germany.
					
					The article said that the Korean people are often talking about "June 15 reunification" because they are convinced that to implement the June 15 joint declaration is the only way of bringing earlier the national reunification.
					
					It went on: There took place joint events in the north and the south of Korea and reunion of separated families and their relatives after the adoption of the joint declaration.
					
					The new era when these eye-opening events took place is called "June 15 era of reunification" in the north and the south.
					
					The support for the joint declaration means reunification, whereas its denial means confrontation and war.
					
					The Korean nation will certainly build a reunified thriving nation, shouting hurrah for "June 15 reunification".
					
					The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted an article on its website on the anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Syrian Paper, Guinean Radio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Syrian Paper, Guinean Radio
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A Syrian paper and Guinean radios devoted special write-ups to the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Al Baath on June 19 said:
					
					After starting his work at the C.C., the WPK on June 19, 1964 he developed in depth the Juche idea of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, as required by the era and the developing revolution.
					
					His ideas and theories served like an encyclopedia dealing with all fabrics of social life ranging from the building of the party, state, armed forces and economy to education, public health, arts and sports.
					
					He wisely led the WPK to demonstrate its dignity as the mother party serving the people after forming a harmonious whole with them and an invincible party with steel-like discipline.
					
					He victoriously led the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation, bringing about epoch-making changes to be specially recorded in history.
					
					Providing ceaseless field guidance to every nook and corner of the country without a moment's rest till the last moments of his life, he led the Korean people in their struggle to build an economic power.
					
					He is alive in the hearts of the Korean people as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					The domestic radio, international radio and seven national languages radio of Guinea on June 18 praised him for performing undying feats in party building.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party Building Praised by Indian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party Building Praised by Indian Personages
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Seminars, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held by the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics and the National IT Institute of India from June 17 to 19 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					On display in the venues of the events were photos on his undying exploits. 
					
					The participants in the film shows watched Korean films "The Country Shining with Arms of Mt. Paektu" and "Arms of Korea".
					
					S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, said that one of the extraordinary exploits General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed while working at the C.C., WPK was that he achieved the harmonious whole of the party and the popular masses. 
					
					Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the genuine mother party for the people. 
					
					Sadhna Harish, chairwoman of the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics, said Kim Jong Il was the kind-hearted father who devoted all his life to the sacred cause for the people's happiness.
					
					The director of the Education Center under the National IT Institute of India said the ideological and theoretical exploits of Kim Jong Il are great ones which deserve praise of mankind. 
					
					Messages of greetings to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					The Indian paper New Delhi Times on June 17 dedicated a whole page to articles including "The great leader of mother party" together with his photo.
					
					The paper introduced at length the undying exploits he performed by putting forth the Juche-oriented idea and theory of building a party and fully embodying them, thereby developing the WPK into the revolutionary party of Juche type. 
					
					The June 17-23 issue of the Lao paper Heng Ngan ran an article titled "Eternal general secretary of WPK" which said that he developed the WPK into the mother party serving the popular masses by forming a harmonious whole with them and the invincible party with steel-strong discipline. 
					
					He meant the WPK for the Korean people and the WPK is like a mother as it looks after their destiny and future, the article stressed. 
					
					The Indonesian paper Suara Karya on June 14 carried an article titled "New strategic line" introducing the WPK's new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: CRPP acusa a autoridades surcoreanas por haber publicado nota de dialogo N-S
articles.content:
CRPP acusa a autoridades surcoreanas por haber publicado nota de dialogo N-S
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 27 una declaracion  urgente como sigue:
					Hace poco, la banda titere surcoreana publico totalmente la nota de dialogo de la Cumbre Norte-Sur de Corea de 2007 consternando a todo el mundo.
					
					De punto a cabo, tales notas se tratan en absoluto secreto en todos los paises y tambien  en el Sur de Corea pasaba lo mismo como "nota  presidencial".
					
					Sin embargo, la camarilla de conservadores titeres del Sur de Corea con el objetivo de cambiar la situacion desfavorable de sufragio creada en las "elecciones presidenciales" de 2012, insistio en la necesidad de publicar la nota de dialogo argumentando que el ex presidente surcoreano Roh Moo Hyun pronuncio palabras de renunciar la "linea de limite al Norte" del Mar Oeste de Corea en el proceso de las conversaciones de cumbre N-S de 2007, lo cual quedo invalido por la fuerte protesta de la opinion publica.
					
					Pero, los actuales conservadores titeres surcoreanos las publicaron de repente  cuestionando otra vez el contenido de las palabras de Roh a fin de prevenir la peligrosidad de la existencia del actual "gobierno" creada por el "caso de intervencion del Servicio de Inteligencia en las elecciones presidenciales".
					
					Tanto en la historia de relaciones intercoreanas como en la de diplomacia del mundo, no habian tales acciones inimaginables. Con motivo de este caso, en el Sur de Corea se ha creado el gran caos y los partidos opositores, diversos estratos y medios de prensa lo condenan fuertemente calificandolo como "primer escandalo estatal en la historia", "golpe", "rebelion" y "accion sobrelegal".
					
					Como es conocido por todos, la cumbre N-S de 2007 fue un gran acontecimiento especial de la nacion que abrio una nueva coyuntura en el desarrollo de relaciones de ambas partes coreanas y en la labor para la reunificacion de Corea, junto con el 15 de junio.
					
					En la cumbre se consultaron los temas importantes para la reconciliacion, la unidad, la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad de la nacion y como resultado, se publico la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, la cual arranco unanime apoyo y bienvenida de toda la nacion coreana y del mundo.
					
					El presente caso muestra patentemente que la banda de conservadores surcoreanos es la horda de gangsteres politicos de lesa cortesia que difama abiertamente la mencionada historica declaracion y abusa hasta de la cumbre N-S para el conflicto politico y que la politica en el Sur de Corea es la peor de los politiqueros pueriles carentes de los conocimientos politicos y diplomaticos y de la etica de las relaciones intercoreanas  que se pueden ver solo en un pais atrasado bajo el coloniaje 
					
					La "linea de limite al Norte", de que hablan tanto los conservadores surcoreanos, es la fantasmal cuya ilegitimidad fue reconocida por el propio amo gringo de ellos quien la ha delineado. Por lo tanto, resulta absurdo que insistan en la "defensa" y "mantenimiento" de esa linea.
					
					Ademas, la solucion pacifica y racional del problema de demarcacion maritima del Mar Oeste de Corea esta aclarada en la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. Si este documento intercoreano hubiera sido implementado, no habria surgido hoy ningun problema al respecto.
					
					Cuando quedo revelado a todo el mundo el complot de usurpacion del "poder" al conocerse el "incidente de intervencion del Servicio de Inteligencia en las elecciones presidenciales" y se alzan las voces de condena y protesta en diversos sectores sociales, la camarilla titere surcoreana busco la salida en dar a la publicidad las notas de dialogo de la cumbre N-S con el objetivo de distraer la opinion publica, reparar la crisis de "poder" y exterminar a las fuerzas democraticas pro-reunificacion tildandolas de las "pro-Norte".
					
					Asi quiere sofocar la aspiracion de todos los coreanos al dialogo N-S y a la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y levantar en el Sur de Corea la ola de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					En fin de cuentas, esos gangsteres escogieron como ofrenda de su disputa politica hasta la cumbre intercoreana que discutio francamente los problemas vinculados con el destino de la nacion y las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					?Sera posible entonces que esos elementos acudan con buena fe a la mesa de dialogo para debatir la reunificacion de la patria y la mejora de relaciones N-S que desean unanimemente todos los compatriotas?
					
					La publicacion de las notas de la cumbre la pueden cometer solo los traidores de peor calana que perjudican sin vacilacion alguna la dignidad y los maximos intereses de la nacion para sus sucias ambiciones politicas.
					
					?Con que cara hablan a menudo de la "confianza" los conservadores surcoreanos si son capaces de publicar hasta esas notas, que deben ser tomadas como las mas sagradas, para sus intereses fraccionalistas?
					
					La publicacion unilateral de ellas sin la aprobacion de la RPDC resulta una burla a la maxima dignidad de esta y una grave provocacion a la contraparte de dialogo.
					
					Ni la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak, connotado grupo de elementos conflictivos con la connacional RPDC, se atrevio a cometer esa locura.
					
					Esta claro que la publicacion no habria sido posible sin la autorizacion directa de la actual gobernante de Chongwadae.
					
					No cabe duda de que Chongwadae esta detras del "incidente de intervencion del Servicio de Inteligencia en las elecciones presidenciales" y del caso de publicacion de las notas de cumbre.
					
					Si hablamos de las "fuerzas pro-Norte" a que quieren cuestionar publicamente ahora los titeres surcoreanos, no puede estar inocente ninguna de las autoridades surcoreanas que habian visitado a Pyongyang.
					
					?Se puede creer en la sinceridad de la cumbre y la "diplomacia de cumbre", de que hablan los titeres surcoreanos, si estos malemplean en sus fines politicos hasta las notas de conversaciones de la cumbre que deben ser respetadas al maximo?
					
					Los uniformados y civiles de la RPDC no toleraran nunca esa locura.
					
					Al ser publicadas esas notas, quedo comprobado que los cuestionamientos de los titeres surcoreanos no tienen razon ni estan apegados a la realidad. Asi que ellos cayeron en la propia trampa.
					
					La banda de los titeres surcoreanos sera arruinada siendo condenada y maldecida por toda la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador aleman
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador aleman
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 27 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador aleman en Corea, Gerhard Thiedemann, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Prosiguen multitudinarios mitines antiyanquis en provincias
articles.content:
Prosiguen multitudinarios mitines antiyanquis en provincias
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio, tuvieron lugar el dia 27 los mitines multitudinarios en las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte, de Hwanghae del Sur y de Hamgyong del Norte. 
					Asistieron los cuadros de organismos locales del partido y el poder y de entidades de masas, los funcionarios, trabajadores, profesores, empleados y estudiantes de las fabricas, empresas, granjas cooperativas, universidades y escuelas politecnicas de las respectivas localidades. 
					
					Los oradores denunciaron que durante la pasada guerra coreana, los imperialistas destruyeron lo todo de la tierra patria y asesinaron bestialmente a los habitantes inocentes con el fin de eliminar a la RPDC en su cuna. 
					
					Puntualizaron que bajo la sabia guia del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC libraron una lucha heroica por defender la patria e infligieron amarga derrota al imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Prosiguieron que hoy tambien, EE.UU. trata de provocar la nueva guerra en contubernio con los titeres surcoreanos, con el fin de realizar su ambicion de agredir a la RPDC. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos estan firmemente convencidos del triunfo porque cuentan con el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, apuntaron. 
					
					Expusieron la decision de aumentar la capacidad de defensa nacional bajo la bandera del Songun, dinamizar la ofensiva general para crear la segunda y tercera "velocidad Masikryong" y frustrar tajantemente la campana de los imperialistas tendente a atropellar a la RPDC. 
					
					Luego, los participantes realizaron una marcha antiyanqui.

articles.title: Ex escritor de guerra Kim Sa Ryang
articles.content:
Ex escritor de guerra Kim Sa Ryang
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fue otorgado el titulo de Heroe de la RPDC al ex escritor de guerra Kim Sa Ryang (1914-1950), caido hace mas de 60 anos. 
					Nacio en la familia de un empresario que administraba una pequena fundicion en Pyongyang. 
					
					Antes de la liberacion de Corea, fue expulsada de la escuela normal de Pyongyang por haber tomado parte en una huelga estudiantil y despues curso estudios universitarios en el extranjero. 
					
					Desde aquel entonces, comenzo su vida de creacion literaria. 
					
					Su primera novela corta es "Thosongrang" (creada en 1936), seguida de otras novelas como "Bajo el rayo" (1939). 
					
					En primavera del 34 (1945) de la Era Juche, escribio en China una nota de viaje, en la cual alabo al Presidente Kim Il Sung como "Sol que irradia todo el territorio patrio" y a la Guerrilla Antijaponesa como "unidad del Sol" 
					
					Regreso a la patria despues de liberada la patria en agosto de 1945 y fue recibido en varias ocasiones por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Trabajando como miembro ejecutivo de la Federacion General de Arte del Norte de Corea, director de Cultura Internacional y presidente de la Asociacion de Arte de la provincia de Phyong-an de Sur, creo dramas, novelas, dramas en verso y ensayos.
					
					Entre esas obras, se destaca "Trueno" (1946) que describe las nobles personalidades del Presidente por primera vez despues de la liberacion de Corea. 
					
					El 28 de agosto de 1946, dia del Congreso Inaugural del Partido del Trabajo de Corea del Norte, el Presidente vio el drama "Trueno", que se trata del historico triunfo en la batalla de Pochonbo, y aprecio mucho esta obra creada por Kim Sa Ryang.
					
					Cuando estallo la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (25 de junio de 1950-27 de julio de 1953), Kim Sa Ryang, siendo escritor de guerra, escribio muchas obras, entre otras, el diario "De Seul a Suwon", "Vencimos asi", "Pasando por la zona guerrillera del monte Jiri", "En la trinchera a la orilla del rio Rakdong" (partes I y II) y "Se ve el mar". 
					
					Sus obras describieron el heroismo masivo y la fe en victoria de los combatientes del Ejercito Popular de Corea y desarrollaron de diversas maneras los generos literarios de caracter movil y combativo de acuerdo con las circunstancias de guerra. 
					
					Mientras luchaba como guerrillero del monte Jiri, cayo heroicamente con sus companeros al explotar las granadas de mano gritando "!Viva el General Kim Il Sung!"

articles.title: Minju Joson condena actos conmemorativos de guerra coreana en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena actos conmemorativos de guerra coreana en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 25, la banda titere surcoreana sostuvo en el gimnasio Jamsil de Seul el "acto conmemorativo del 63o aniversario de la guerra del 25 de junio" reuniendo a los participantes en la pasada guerra coreana.
					Ademas, intenta realizar el dia 29 desde el  museo memorial de guerra de Ryongsan hasta la plaza de Seul la "parada Hoguk" del ejercito, la policia, etc. A partir del dia pasado 23, esta auspiciando el "campismo de paz de los jovenes y ninos" de los paises que habian enviado mercenarios a la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					Tales actos son farsas anti-RPDC para fomentar la hostilidad y confrontacion fratricida tergiversando hechos historicos.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					La pasada guerra coreana fue la de agresion desatada por EE.UU. y el ejercito titere surcoreano con la ambicion de ocupar a la entonces joven RPDC.
					
					Si los titeres surcoreanos tuvieran juicio, deberan condenar severamente a EE.UU. que ha desatado la pasada guerra coreana e impuesto a la nacion coreana tremendos desastres de guerra.
					
					Por el contrario, esos vendepatrias proyanquis organizaron unas payasadas anti-RPDC para encubrir los horrendos crimenes de guerra del imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Lo peor del caso es que ellos involucraron en esas farsas hasta a los jovenes y ninos de los paises emisores de mercenarios.
					
					Esto es una manifestacion de su intento de atacar a la RPDC en contubernio con fuerzas extranjeras, al igual que en la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no podran ganar nada mas que la vergonzosa derrota si siguen lanzando la campana de confrontacion fratricida.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun vuelve a demandar a Japon indemnizar crimenes de pasado
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun vuelve a demandar a Japon indemnizar crimenes  de pasado
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 7, el gobierno britanico pidio disculpa oficial a su ex colonia Kenia por sus crimenes del pasado.
					Pero, Japon desafia frontalmente a la universal concepcion de la historia de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					Al principio, el pais isleno actuo con frenesi para ocultar su historia criminal y ahora, elude la liquidacion de los crimenes del pasado justificandolos como "causa de justicia". Elogia como "heroes" a los criminales de guerra de primer grado que dirigieron la agresion a Asia y la Guerra del Pacifico y suelta disparates de que fue "legitimo" el dominio de ocupacion militar a Corea.
					
					Se distribuyen abiertamente los manuales  que borraron los tremendos crimenes antieticos y embellecen la historia de agresion de su pais.
					
					Solo Japon tergiversa vilmente los hechos historicos de la primera mitad del siglo 20 cometidos en los paises cercanos.
					
					Tales actos cinicos y viles se justifican con el argumento ilogico de que el reconocimiento y la liquidacion de los crimenes del pasado significan "maltratar voluntariamente a si mismo".
					
					Las conductas de Japon parten de la ambicion de repetir sin falta la historia del pasado.
					
					Pero, las autoridades japonesas deben saber bien que le caeran solo la verguenza y la derrota.
					
					Japon debe darse clara cuenta de su destino y perspectiva y seguir la tendencia de la actual epoca cambiada.
